iiv.util

Class FormatTools

  • java.lang.Object
    • iiv.util.FormatTools

  • public class FormatTools
extends Object
    Class to format numbers with exponentials.
    Since:
    iiV1.142
    See Also:
    CNUViewer, Container

      • formatScientific

        public static String formatScientific(double d,
                                      int p,
                                      NumberFormat df)
        Formats the number to have exponent powers of p.
        Parameters:
        d - number to format
        p - exponent powers, if < 1 no exponent
        df - formatter for non-exponent part of number
        Returns:
        number as a formatted string

      • formatScientific

        public static String formatScientific(double d,
                                      int p,
                                      NumberFormat df,
                                      String exponentSymbol)
        Formats the number to have exponent powers of p.
        Parameters:
        d - number to format
        p - exponent powers, if < 1 no exponent
        df - formatter for non-exponent part of number
        exponentSymbol - string containing the exponent symbol
        Returns:
        number as a formatted string

        Pads a string with spaces.
        Parameters:
        s - string to pad
        toLength - length to grow string to
        mode - RIGHT or LEFT padding
